alert.note: Alert for Clinch (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 20 at 10:17PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Clinch County through 1100 PM EDT... At 1017 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Mayday, or 10 miles south of Lakeland, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Homerville and Du Pont. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
